report.title: All occurrences
report.description: Lists all occurrences for a survey.
report.comment: This report depends upon this function having been created in the database. CREATE AGGREGATE CONCAT ( BASETYPE = text, SFUNC = textcat, STYPE = text, INITCOND = '' );
report.query: SELECT s.id AS sam_id, (SELECT term FROM terms t LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav on oav.int_value = t.id WHERE oav.occurrence_id = o.id AND oav.occurrence_attribute_id = 53) AS certainty, o.id AS occ_id, s.date_start AS date, sav1.text_value || ' ' || sav2.text_value AS name, s.location_name AS location, o.comment as occ_comment, (SELECT CONCAT('' '' || '') FROM occurrence_images WHERE occurrence_id = o.id ) AS photos FROM samples as s JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id = s.id JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id = s.id AND sav1.sample_attribute_id = 6 JOIN sample_attribute_values sav2 ON sav2.sample_id = s.id AND sav2.sample_attribute_id = 7 WHERE s.survey_id = #survey# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND o.zero_abundance = FALSE AND o.taxa_taxon_list_id = #taxon#
